rules_text:
When Nutrient Churner enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, you get {E}{E}{E} [i](three energy counters)[/i].
{T}, Pay {E}{E}: Until end of turn, target creature gains “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control with a finality counter on it”. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)[/i]
